page.title: 10BUILDINGS IN VILLAGE WILLAND
page.content: {HOWDEN LODGE OLD BUILDING}VISITED BY KATIE WHITCOMBE AND LINDSAY WHIPP, WHO LIVES IN THE HOUSE. HOWDEN LODGE IS OVER 200 YEARS OLD. IT HAS 13 ROOMS, 3 OF WHICH ARE BEDROOMS. THEY HAVENT A VERY BIG GARDEN BUT THEY GROW FRUIT AND VEGETABLES. IT USE TO BE 3 HOUSES AND WHEN IT WAS CONVERTED INTO ONE THE CHICKS LIVED HERE,THEY WERE UNDERTAK_ ERS. THEYUSED TO MAKE COFFINS AND PUT THE DEAD BODIES IN THEM. THEN THEY WOULD PUSH THE LOT DOWN A CHUTE TO THE OLD SHED. THE HOUSE WAS ONCE THATCHED. {MEADOW PARK NEW BUILDING }VISITED BY TERESA SCHNUR AND LOUISE KINGDOM. MEADOW PARK IS OPPOSITE THE SCHOOL .1 WE ASKED THE SITE MANAGER ABOUT THE NEW BUILDINGS. HE SAID THE LAND WAS CLAY ON TOP AND STONE UNDER THAT. THEY HAD HAD TO CLEAR AWAY MANY TREES. THE HOUSE ARE BUILT SMALLER THESE DAYS BECAUSE OF THE COST.(SEE PAGE HOMES)
